Verses: 1 janaththin Adhigaarigal Erusalemile Kudiyirundhaargal; Matra Janangal, Thangalukkulle Paththupperil Oruvanai Erusalemennum Parisuththa Nagaraththilum Onbadhuperai Matrap Pattanangalilum Kudiyirukkappanni, Seettugalaip Pottaargal.
2 aanaalum Erusalemile Kudiyirukka Manappoorvamaai Sammadhiththa Manushargalaiyellaam Janangal Vaazhththinaargal.

3 yoodhaavin Pattanangalil Isravelarum Aasaariyarum, Leviyarum, Nidhaneemiyarum Saalomonudaiya Velaikkaararin Puththirarum, Avaravar Thangal Pattanangalilulla Thangal Kaaniboomiyile Kudiyirundhaargal; Erusalemile Kudiyirundha Naadugalin Thalaivar Yaarendraal:

4 erusalemile Yoodhaa Puththiraril Silarum, Benyameen Puththiraril Silarum Kudiyirundhaargal; Yoodhaa Puththirarile Peresin Puththirarukkul Oruvanaana Magalaaleyelin Kumaaranaagiya Sepadhiyaavin Kumaaran Amariyaavukkup Pirandha Sagariyaavukkuk Kumaaranaana Usiyaavin Magan Aththaayaavum,
5 seelonin Kumaaran Sagariyaavukkuk Kumaaranaagiya Yoyaaribukkuk Kumaaranaana Adhaayaavukkup Pirandha Asaayaavin Kumaaran Kollosepetra Paarukkin Magan Maaseyaavume.
6 erusalemile Kudiyirukkira Peresin Puththirarellaarum Naanootru Arubaththettup Paraakkiramasaaligalaayirundhaargal.

7 benyameen Puththiraril Yaarendraal Sallu Enbavan; Ivan Mesullaamukkum, Ivan Yovelukkum, Ivan Pedhaayaavukkum, Ivan Kolaayaavukkum, Ivan Maaseyaavukkum, Ivan Idhiyelukkum, Ivan Esaayaavukkum Kumaaranaanavan.
8 avanukkuppin Kappaai, Sallaai Mudhalaanavargal Tholaayiraththu Irubaththettupper.
9 avargalmel Visaarippukkaaranaana Sikriyin Kumaaran Yovelum, Pattanaththinmel Irandaavadhu Visaarippukkaaranaana Senuvaavin Kumaaran Yoodhaavume.
10 aasaariyargalil Yoyaaripin Kumaaran Yedhaayaa, Yaagin Enbavargalum,
11 agidhoopin Kumaaran Meraayoththukkup Pirandha Saadhokkin Kumaaran Mesullaam Petra Ilkkiyaavin Magan Seraayaa Ennum Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththin Visaaranaikkarththanum,

12 aalayaththile Panividai Seygira Avargal Sagodhararaagiya Ennootru Irubaththiranduperum, Malkiyaavin Kumaaran Paskoorukku Maganaana Sagariyaavin Kumaaran Amsikkup Pirandha Pelliyaavin Kumaaran Erogaamukkup Pirandha Adhaayaavum,
13 pidhaa Vamsaththalaivanaagiya Avanudaiya Sagodharar Irunootru Naarpaththiranduperum, Immerin Kumaaran Mesillemoththin Maganaagiya Agasaaikkup Pirandha Asareyelin Magan Amaasaayum,
14 avargaludaiya Sagodhararaagiya Paraakkiramasaaligal Nootru Irubaththettupperume; Ivargalmel Agedholimin Kumaaran Sapthiyel Visaarippukkaaranaayirundhaan.
15 leviyarile Punniyin Kumaaran Sabiyaavin Maganaagiya Asrikkaamin Kumaaranaana Asoopin Magan Semaayaavum,
16 dhevanudaiya Aalayaththin Velivelaiyai Visaarikkira Leviyarin Thalaivarile Sapedhaayum, Yosabaaththum,

17 aasaabin Kumaaran Sapthiyin Kumaaranaagiya Meegaavin Magan Maththaniyaa Jebaththil Sthoththirappaattaith Thuvakkugira Thalaivanum Avan Sagodhararil Irandaavadhaana Pakpookkiyaa Ennum Oruvanum, Edhuththoonin Kumaaran Kaalaavin Maganaagiya Samuvaavin Kumaaran Apthaavume.
18 parisuththa Pattanaththilirundha Leviyar Ellaarum Irunootru Enbaththunaaluper.
19 vaasal Kaavalaalar Akkoobum, Thalmonum Vaasalgalil Kaavalkaakkira Avargal Sagodhararum Nootruezhubaththiranduper.
20 matra Isravelarum, Aasaariyarum, Leviyarum, Yoodhaavin Sagala Pattanangalilum, Avaravar Thangal Sudhandharaththilirundhaargal.
21 nidhaneemiyar Obelile Kudiyirundhaargal; Avargalmel Seegaavum Kispaavum Visaarippukkaararaayirundhaargal.

22 erusalemilirukkira Leviyarin Visaarippukkaaran Meegaavin Kumaaran Maththaniyaavin Maganaagiya Asabiyaavukkup Pirandha Paaniyin Kumaaran Oosi Enbavan Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththin Oozhiyaththukku Nirkira Paadagaraagiya Aasaabin Kumaararil Oruvan.
23 paadagaraagiya Avargalukkaaga Andraadagappadi Kodukkappadumpadi Raajaavinaal Kattalaiyidappattirundhadhu.
24 yoodhaavin Kumaaranaagiya Seraakkin Puththiraril Mesasaabeyelin Kumaaran Peththagiyaa Janaththin Kaariyangalukkellaam Raajaavin Samugaththil Nindraan.

25 thangal Naattuppurangalaana Graamangalil Irukkiravargalukkulle Yoodhaavin Puththiraril Silar Keeriyaadharpaavilum Adhin Graamangalilum, Theeponilum Adhin Graamangalilum, Ekaabseyelilum Adhin Graamangalilum,
26 yesuvaavilum, Molaadhaagilum, Pedhpeledhilum,
27 aadhsaarsoogaavilum, Peyersebaavilum, Adhin Graamangalilum,
28 siklaagilum, Mekonaagilum, Adhin Graamangalilum,
29 enrimmonilum, Saareyaagilum, Yarmooththilum,
30 saanovaalum, Adhullaamilum Avaigalin Graamangalilum, Laageesilum Adhin Naattuppurangalilum, Asekkaavilum Adhin Graamangalilum, Peyersebaa Thodangi Innomin Pallaththaakkumattum Kudiyerinaargal.
31 kebaavin Ooraaraayirundha Benyameen Puththirar, Mikmaas, Aayaa, Beththel Oorgalilum Adhin Graamangalilum,
32 aanadhodh, Nop, Ananiyaa,
33 aadhsor, Raamaa, Kiththaayim,
34 aadheedh, Sepoyim, Nepalaadh,
35 lodh, Ono Ennum Oorgalilum, Sirpaasaarigalin Pallaththaakkilum Kudiyirundhaargal.
36 leviyarile Sila Vaguppaar Yoodhaavilum, Silar Benyameenilum Irundhaargal.
